sentences.en: " I work for my paycheck, so it is active income. "
sentences.cn: 我工作赚钱, 所以是正当收入.

sentences.en: A : Man , they take a lot of our paycheck.
sentences.cn: 嘿, 他们从我的薪水里扣了不少钱哦.

sentences.en: A two - paycheck income is good security.
sentences.cn: 两份收入让生活更有保障.

sentences.en: Debra: I'm broke. I've gone through my paycheck for the week already.
sentences.cn: 黛布拉: 我没钱了. 这周的工资已经花完了.

sentences.en: Have you looked at your paycheck lately?
sentences.cn: 你最近看了自己的薪水支票了吗？

sentences.en: I'd turn over my paycheck the minute I got it - that's Friday noon.
sentences.cn: 每星期五中午发工资,只要工资一到手,我就立刻交出来.

sentences.en: I'm sorry , but I already went through my paycheck for the week.
sentences.cn: 抱歉, 我这星期的薪水已经花光了.

sentences.en: Instead, they have to take any job to get a paycheck.
sentences.cn: 恰恰相反, 他们不得不接受任何只要能够拿到薪水的工作.

sentences.en: It is wise to set aside some money from each paycheck.
sentences.cn: 从每次的工资支票中拨出一些钱(作为贮存)是明智之举.

sentences.en: My paycheck doesn't even begin to pay for my rent.
sentences.cn: 我的工资甚至还不够我付房租.

sentences.en: Roger: I do not understand. Will I still get a paycheck?
sentences.cn: 罗杰 ︰ 我不了解. 我还是有薪水可领 吧 ?

sentences.en: Save: I save at least 10 % of each paycheck.
sentences.cn: 储蓄 ︰ 我至少将每次薪水的10%用于储蓄.

sentences.en: The phone bill amounted to half his monthly paycheck.
sentences.cn: 电话费达到了他月工资的一半.

sentences.en: The tax takes quite a bite from his paycheck.
sentences.cn: 税收扣去了他薪金的相当一部分.

sentences.en: There is a real surprise party for him - his final paycheck.
sentences.cn: 有一件真使他大吃一惊的事等着他呢 - 他被解雇了.
